meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>person</kanji> of <kanji>romance</kanji> is someone you do romancey things with. That person is your <vocabulary>lover</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is a bit strange. it's the two separate words 恋 and 人 put together, making the reading <reading>こいびと</reading>. Oooh lala. Two words coming together like two people coming together. Rawrs.
